reviews.review_msg: Arsineh cares about her students and is very easy on grades. However, this may not be helpful when grading on a curve. To succeed in her class, you need to do practice problems and understand all course materials. The only downside about her class is that I don't find her lecture very engaging, but maybe it has to do with accounting itself.

She cares about her students & I enjoyed her class. There are a lot to read and practice. However, if you manage your time wisely, plan out your study each week, you'll do well. I took this course while working FT job and was able to get a good grade. I had no background in accounting & her class was one of the most valuable classes I've ever had.

Great Professor, understanding professional and extremely nice. Very accessible for conversations outside of class hours, but she will not just give you the answers to your questions. She will guide you, but not spoon feed.

I took BUSI510 with Arsineh and I really enjoyed the course. It was tough material and she made it very easy to understand. She is willing to help you by walking through complex questions. She goes at a good pace but you should also expect to put work in the class. Excellent professor with a good understanding of material and very friendly.
